text: Applause is a 1929 American musical movie directed by first time director Rouben Mamoulian and starring Helen Morgan, Jack Cameron, Joan Peers, Henry Wadsworth. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1929 movies Category:1920s musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Rouben Mamoulian Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Applause (1929 movie)
